data.text:
@FaithBorkowsky @reading_league March 4-5
I think my session is on the 4th..

@FaithBorkowsky @reading_league I shouldn`t forget my own country-a wasteland when it comes to reading research.
My best customer is Wisconsin!
Go figure!
I`m looking forward to seeing you in March at Everyone Reading.
I`m doing a session on testing and analysis!

@FaithBorkowsky @reading_league Unlike med. where a process of rsrch consolidation is achieved,education is consumed with ideology,these opined individuals run districts like Baltimore, Los Angeles etc.-yrs ago I met the boss of LA-I bought her Sally`s book and gave her a copy of NRP-She thru it in the garbage!
@JoAnneGross1 @reading_league It’s just so frustrating to watch children suffer. I cannot understand the refusal to acknowledge the underlying cause. How do people justify this?

@FaithBorkowsky @reading_league My own son had three assessments-it was never tested-in my own reading clinics and schools-we see it constantly-and these are private assessments-we know what they $$$$
I have been at this since inspired by the Reid Lyon- Jo Torgesen era,the Linnea Ehri studies-the NRP-sad 😢😪😪
